alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Pender, inland Brunswick, southern Columbus and northern Horry Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Delco to Bethel. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leland, Loris, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Northwest, Makatoka, Freeland, Nakina, Exum, Bughill, Ash, Goretown, Riegelwood, Honey Island, Old Dock, Mollie, Batarora, Freeman, Pireway and Dulah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
